mapper.sql: user_id, username, password,email, phone_no, enabled, is_first, role_type, role_desc,id_org , real_name, remark, last_login_time, is_deleted, gmt_create, gmt_modify
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO user_info( username , password , email , phone_no , enabled , real_name , id_org ,
sex,
remark , gmt_create , gmt_modify , operator , idcard , photo_addr , user_cd ) VALUES ( #{username} , #{password} , #{email} , #{phoneNo} , #{enabled} , #{realName} , #{idOrg} ,
#{sex} ,
#{remark} , now() , now() , #{operator} , #{idcard} , #{photoAddr} , #{userCd} );

INSERT INTO user_role( user_id , role_id , is_deleted , gmt_create , gmt_modify ) VALUES
(#{userId}, #{item}, 'N' , NOW(), NOW())
mapper.delete: update user_role set is_deleted = 'Y' where user_id = #{userId}
mapper.update:
UPDATE user_info SET
username = #{username} ,
email = #{email} ,
phone_no = #{phoneNo} ,
enabled = #{enabled} ,
is_first = #{isFirst} ,
role_type = #{roleType} ,
role_desc = #{roleDesc} ,
real_name = #{realName} ,
sex = #{sex} ,
remark = #{remark} ,
is_deleted = #{isDeleted} ,
operator = #{operator},
id_org = #{idOrg},
idcard = #{idcard},
photo_addr = #{photoAddr}, user_cd = #{userCd}, gmt_modify = NOW() WHERE user_id = #{userId};
mapper.select: SELECT ui.user_id, ui.username, ui.password, ui.email, ui.phone_no, ui.enabled, ui.is_first, ui.role_type, ui.role_desc, ui.id_org , ui.real_name, ui.remark, ui.last_login_time, ui.is_deleted, ui.gmt_create, ui.gmt_modify, so.fg_active FROM user_info ui left join sys_org so on ui.id_org = so.id_org WHERE ui.username = #{userName} and ui.is_deleted = 'N'

SELECT count(1) FROM user_info ui left join user_role ur on ui.user_id = ur.user_id and ur.is_deleted = 'N' inner join sys_role sr on ur.role_id = sr.role_id and sr.code != 'MCST'
LEFT JOIN( SELECT a.user_id , min(b.level) as level FROM user_role a LEFT JOIN sys_role b ON a.role_id = b.role_id WHERE a.is_deleted = 'N' group by a.user_id ORDER BY b.level DESC ) temp ON ui.user_id = temp.user_id
WHERE ui.is_deleted = 'N'
and ui.username like concat(#{conditionValue},'%')
and ui.real_name like concat(#{conditionValue},'%')
and ui.phone_no like concat(#{conditionValue},'%')
and ui.id_org = #{idOrg}
and ur.role_id = #{roleId}
and ui.username != 'super'
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM user_info WHERE username = #{userName} and is_deleted = 'N'

SELECT a.user_id as studentId, a.real_name, a.sex, a.email, a.phone_no, b.na_org as orgName, d.name as className FROM user_info a LEFT JOIN sys_org b on a.id_org = b.id_org LEFT JOIN id_class_memo c ON a.user_id = c.id_user LEFT JOIN sys_class d on c.id_class = d.id_class WHERE a.user_id = #{idStudent}

SELECT org_student_depart.id_student_depart , user_info.real_name , user_info.phone_no , user_info.idcard , user_info.photo_addr FROM user_info JOIN user_role ON user_info.user_id = user_role.user_id JOIN sys_role ON user_role.role_id = sys_role.role_id JOIN org_student_depart ON user_info.user_id = org_student_depart.id_user JOIN org_grade ON org_student_depart.id_grade = org_grade.id_grade WHERE sys_role.code = 'MCST' AND user_info.idcard = #{idCard} AND org_grade.fg_active = 1 AND org_grade.fg_valid = 0 limit 1
